mapper.select: select * from t_comment t where 1=1 and status='y' and productID=#{productID} order by id desc limit #{offset},#{pageSize}
select count(*) from (select 1 from t_comment t where 1=1 and status='y' and productID=#{productID} ) a
mapper.insert: insert into t_comment ( id,createdate,nickname ,productID ,account ,orderID ,orderdetailID ,content ,status ,star ) values ( id,now(),#{nickname} ,#{productID} ,#{account} ,#{orderID} ,#{orderdetailID} ,#{content} ,#{status} ,#{star} )
mapper.update: update t_comment set id=#{id},createdate=now() ,productID=#{productID} ,account=#{account} ,orderID=#{orderID} ,orderdetailID=#{orderdetailID} ,content=#{content} ,status=#{status} ,star=#{star} where 1=1 and id=#{id}
mapper.select: select * from t_comment t where 1=1 and status='y' and id=#{id} and account=#{account} and productID=#{productID} and orderID=#{orderID}
mapper.delete: delete from t_comment where 1=1 and id=#{id}
mapper.select: select count(*) from t_comment where 1=1 and orderID=#{orderID}
